    Design Projects

    A collection of projects related to design, user research and prototyping

    Dormio

    less than 1 minute read

    A smart watch which passively induces sleep and nudges users to form better sleep habits

    Drawbot

    less than 1 minute read

    A Deep Learning algorithm that turns bad sketches into (almost) drop-dead masterpieces

    Automating Target Based Care at the Lucille Packard Children’s Hospital

    Developed a workflow to facilitate faster development of new patient cohorts and set targets for those patients.

    Plug & Play

    11 minutes read

    An interactive music player design that explores a more tactile relationship with music in today’s digital world.

    Changing Attitudes Towards Online Privacy

    4 minutes read

    A human subject research conducted on how online foorprints can be used to change people’s perception towards digital privacy.

    Pul

    2 minutes read

    A Blockchain based distributed system that allows people without agency the opportunity to have their voices heard in the decision making process

    Identity

    2 minutes read

    An illustration that explores the complexity inherent in how an individual understands themselves.

    Design Thinking Bootcamp

    less than 1 minute read

    Organized and facilitated a workshop on design thinking for mid-career professionals at the Stanford d. school

    Date Night

    2 minutes read

    A prototype for a service that helps grad students with children to reclaim their mental health.

    Virasat - An Heirloom

    less than 1 minute read

    A bronze cast heirloom that I made for my wife as part of the Design and Manufacture class at Stanford.
